name: UIPasteConfiguration
desc: The interface that an object implements to declare its ability to accept specific data types for pasting and for drag and drop activities.

items.name: init(acceptableTypeIdentifiers: [String])
items.desc: Initializes a new paste configuration with a specified array of acceptable UTIs.

items.name: init(forAccepting: NSItemProviderReading.Type)
items.desc: Initializes a new paste configuration with the UTIs declared as supported by a specified class.

items.name: var acceptableTypeIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: An array of UTI strings that specify the types accepted by the paste configuration.

items.name: func addAcceptableTypeIdentifiers([String])
items.desc: Adds an array of UTI strings to a paste configuration, increasing the variety of types the paste configuration accepts.

items.name: func addTypeIdentifiers(forAccepting: NSItemProviderReading.Type)
items.desc: Expands the array of accepted UTIs for a paste configuration, based on those declared as supported by a specified class.
